title: Second Date Update - PT 1: Did He Ghost Her Because Of An Accidental AirDrop?
description:
Here’s how second date update works: you had a first date, it was great, you think a second one is coming…and then out of nowhere, they drop you. No second date, no nothing. But things were going SO WELL – what happened?!
Robin thought she hit it off with a guy she met at a party. While the two were talking her friend airdropped her number to the guy. A few days later, he asked her out for drinks.
But when they met for drinks, she could sense something was off. She hasn't heard from him since and wants to know why he ghosted her.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
